text: 21.3: Wkp 26.11-12; 2 Sto 6.18; Ese 37.27; 43.7; Sek 2.10; 2 Ko 6.16; VB 7.15-17Gu ŋgui vhɨrve gari guman pan pigi mpirmpirɨgar han, gu mbararagim, guma mbe kamthooŋ khɨrɨp kaav, khaŋ nzuai, “Ganɨ, ntigem Fhe Bakɨmen Phen gumgi gu mbigi phorga ki. Ana mben rɨgar kɨrga, mbe anan gumgi gu mbigi kɨrga. Ahaŋ, Fhe Bakɨme, ana nduara mbe phorgɨ kɨv, ana nduara mben Fhe Bakɨme kɨrga.
